UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthetic Peptides Derived from Bovine Lactoferricin Exhibit Antimicrobial Activity against E. coli ATCC 11775, S. maltophilia ATCC 13636 and S. enteritidis ATCC 13076
Literature.Author: Huertas Méndez NJ, Vargas Casanova Y, Gómez Chimbi AK, Hernández E, Leal Castro AL, Melo Diaz JM, Rivera Monroy ZJ, García Castañeda JE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MBC=25µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia ATCC 13636(MIC=200µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia ATCC 13636(MBC=200µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=50µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MBC=50µg/ml)
